author: The Film Theorists
description:
*💚 Subscribe to keep Ben safe!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Is the Omnitrix KILLING Ben10? We dig deep into the lore of this series and discover how this handy device could possibly lead to a fatal end to Ben.

title: Film Theory: ﻿Ben10's Omnitrix is DEADLY!
